option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
package com.mpt.rua_java.domain.entity
/** * Entidad de dominio que representa un usuario * Esta clase es el núcleo del negocio y no tiene dependencias externas */ data class User( val id: String, val gender: String, val name: Name, val location: Location, val email: String, val login: Login, val dob: DateOfBirth, val registered: Registered, val phone: String, val cell: String, val picture: Picture, val nat: String, val isAddedToContacts: Boolean = false ) { fun getFullName(): String = "${name.title} ${name.first} ${name.last}"
fun getFullAddress(): String = with(location) { "${street.number} ${street.name}, ${city}, ${state}, ${country} ${postcode}" }
fun getVCardData(): String { return """ BEGIN:VCARD VERSION:3.0 FN:${getFullName()} N:${name.last};${name.first};;${name.title}; EMAIL:$email TEL;TYPE=CELL:$cell TEL;TYPE=VOICE:$phone ADR;TYPE=HOME:;;${location.street.number} ${location.street.name};${location.city};${location.state};${location.postcode};${location.country} BDAY:${dob.date.take(10)} GENDER:${gender.uppercase()} END:VCARD """.trimIndent() } }
data class Name( val title: String, val first: String, val last: String )
data class Location( val street: Street, val city: String, val state: String, val country: String, val postcode: String, val coordinates: Coordinates, val timezone: Timezone )
data class Street( val number: Int, val name: String )
data class Coordinates( val latitude: String, val longitude: String )
data class Timezone( val offset: String, val description: String )
data class Login( val uuid: String, val username: String, val password: String, val salt: String, val md5: String, val sha1: String, val sha256: String )
data class DateOfBirth( val date: String, val age: Int )
data class Registered( val date: String, val age: Int )
data class Picture( val large: String, val medium: String, val thumbnail: String )

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Botones superiores --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutButtons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonLoadUsers" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="4dp" android:text="@string/load_users" android:textSize="11sp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonViewContacts" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp" android:text="@string/view_contacts" android:textSize="11sp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonRefresh" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="@string/refresh" android:textSize="11sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Campo de búsqueda --> <EditText android:id="@+id/editTextSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="@string/search_hint" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutButtons" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- ProgressBar --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/editTextSearch" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Mensaje de error --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textError" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@android:color/holo_red_dark" android:textAlignment="center" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/progressBar" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- RecyclerView para la lista de usuarios --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewUsers" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textError" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:listitem="@layout/item_user" />
<!-- Mensaje cuando no hay usuarios --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textEmptyState" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/no_users" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/recyclerViewUsers" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/recyclerViewUsers" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Botones superiores --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutButtons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonLoadUsers" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="4dp" android:text="@string/load_users" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_large" />
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonViewContacts" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp" android:text="@string/view_contacts" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_large" />
<Button android:id="@+id/buttonRefresh" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="@string/refresh" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_large" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Campo de búsqueda --> <EditText android:id="@+id/editTextSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="@string/search_hint" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutButtons" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- ProgressBar --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/editTextSearch" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Mensaje de error --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textError" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@android:color/holo_red_dark" android:textAlignment="center" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_xsmall" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/progressBar" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- RecyclerView para la lista de usuarios --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewUsers" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textError" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:listitem="@layout/item_user" />
<!-- Mensaje cuando no hay usuarios --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textEmptyState" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/no_users" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/recyclerViewUsers" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/recyclerViewUsers" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Guías para mejor alineación --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline android:id="@+id/guidelineImageEnd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.20" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline android:id="@+id/guidelineButtonStart" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.75" />
<de.hdodenhof.circleimageview.CircleImageView android:id="@+id/imageProfile" android:layout_width="54dp" android:layout_height="54dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_placeholder" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textName" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/black" tools:text="John Doe" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textEmail" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:text="john.doe@example.com" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textName" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textPhone" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" tools:text=" +1 234 567 8900" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textEmail" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textCell" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" tools:text=" +1 234 567 8901" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textPhone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textAddress" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" tools:text=" 123 Main St, City, Country" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textCell" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textGender" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:text="⚥ Male" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/textAge" app:layout_constraintHorizontal_chainStyle="spread_inside" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textAge" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:text=" 25 años" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/textGender" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/textNationality" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNationality" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:text=" US" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/textAge" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonAddToContacts" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="36dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:text="@string/add_to_contacts" android:textSize="10sp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:paddingVertical="6dp" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" android:ellipsize="none" android:singleLine="false" android:gravity="center" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonShowQR" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="36dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/show_qr" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:textSize="10sp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:paddingVertical="6dp" android:gravity="center" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/buttonAddToContacts" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="@dimen/margin_medium" app:cardCornerRadius="@dimen/card_corner_radius" app:cardElevation="@dimen/card_elevation">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="@dimen/margin_xlarge">
<!-- Guías para mejor alineación --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline android:id="@+id/guidelineImageEnd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.20" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline android:id="@+id/guidelineButtonStart" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.75" />
<de.hdodenhof.circleimageview.CircleImageView android:id="@+id/imageProfile" android:layout_width="@dimen/avatar_size" android:layout_height="@dimen/avatar_size" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_placeholder" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textName" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_large" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/black" tools:text="John Doe" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textEmail" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small" tools:text="john.doe@example.com" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textName" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textPhone" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_xsmall" tools:text=" +1 234 567 8900" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textEmail" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textCell" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_xsmall" tools:text=" +1 234 567 8901" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textPhone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textAddress" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_small" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_xsmall" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" tools:text=" 123 Main St, City, Country" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textCell" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textGender" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/margin_large" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_small" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_small" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small" tools:text="⚥ Male" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineImageEnd" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/textAge" app:layout_constraintHorizontal_chainStyle="spread_inside" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textAge" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_small" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_small" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small" tools:text=" 25 años" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/textGender" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/textNationality" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNationality" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_large" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_small" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small" tools:text=" US" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/textAge" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textAddress" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonAddToContacts" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="36dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:text="@string/add_to_contacts" android:textSize="10sp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:paddingVertical="6dp" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" android:ellipsize="none" android:singleLine="false" android:gravity="center" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonShowQR" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="36dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/show_qr" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:textSize="10sp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:paddingVertical="6dp" android:gravity="center" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@id/guidelineButtonStart" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/buttonAddToContacts" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Margins --> <dimen name="margin_small">4dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_medium">8dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_large">12dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_xlarge">16dp</dimen>
<!-- Elevation --> <dimen name="card_elevation">4dp</dimen>
<!-- Corner Radius --> <dimen name="card_corner_radius">8dp</dimen>
<!-- Sizes --> <dimen name="avatar_size">54dp</dimen>
<!-- Text Sizes --> <dimen name="text_size_large">18sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_medium">14sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_small">12sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_xsmall">10sp</dimen> </resources>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Margins --> <dimen name="margin_small">4dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_medium">8dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_large">12dp</dimen> <dimen name="margin_xlarge">16dp</dimen>
<!-- Elevation --> <dimen name="card_elevation">4dp</dimen>
<!-- Corner Radius --> <dimen name="card_corner_radius">8dp</dimen>
<!-- Sizes --> <dimen name="avatar_size">54dp</dimen>
<!-- Text Sizes --> <dimen name="text_size_large">18sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_medium">14sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_small">12sp</dimen> <dimen name="text_size_xsmall">10sp</dimen> </resources>
